title: Heatwaves deliver lasting blows to the economy
subhead: Nuclear reactors shut down, work slowed on construction sites, exhausted employees: Episodes of intense heat have a direct impact on people's jobs. A day with temperatures above 32°C is equivalent to half a day of strikes.

title: PSG-Tottenham: Paris kicks off its season with no real preparation
subhead: Luis Enrique's team has only taken part in a handful of group training sessions before facing Tottenham Hotspur in the UEFA Super Cup. The club will have to adapt to this unprecedented situation over several weeks.

title: The despair of Gaza's last prosthetics makers
subhead: Only nine technicians remain in the Palestinian enclave who can make or adapt prosthetics, while nearly 4,000 people, including 10% of children, have undergone amputations.

subhead: 'Why Do We Party?' (6/6). Once concentrated in mainstream nightclubs in central and western Paris, techno has spread to the city's industrial northeast, a shift that accelerated after the Covid pandemic.
